info.title: Servicing API
info.description: API to get service details about customers

post.summary: Authenticates user information and returns a JWT
Generates a JWT for a user and allows setting the expiration time
Return the authenticated service account id based on the input phone number

Customer_Account_Id.description: Customer Account Id of the pre authorized phone number

Service_Account_Id.description: Service Account Id of the pre authorized phone number

Language.description: The language the customer choose either EN Or ES

post.summary: Save the authenticated customer/service account based on the input phone number after verifying the customer.

Customer_Account_Id.description: Customer Account Id of the pre authorized phone number

Service_Account_Id.description: Service Account Id of the pre authorized phone number

Language.description: The language the customer choose either EN Or ES

post.summary: Gets new access token using a refresh token

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer to fetch

patch.summary: Updates customers email and/or primary phone number

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer to update

post.summary: Adds a note to the customer account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer account to which note is added.

get.summary: Retrieves the notes for the customer account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer account to retrieve the notes

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count of the notes to be retrieved

200.description: 200 returns a list of customer account notes

get.summary: Retrieves payment methods for a customer by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer to fetch payment methods for

post.summary: Retrieves customer information by fuzzy search

get.summary: Retrieves service account information by id

parameters.name: service_account_id
parameters.description: id of service account to search by

parameters.name: customer_account_id
parameters.description: id of customer account to search by

get.summary: Retrieves service account information by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch

get.summary: Retrieves suspension information of a service account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch

User_Description.description: The user description of the suspended transaction.

example.Reason: MOVE OUT CANCELLED DUE TO AN INCOMING MOVE IN

get.summary: Retrieves suspension information of a service account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch

example.Reason: Does not have 12 in. clearance from SWBT, cable TV, etc. cables

get.summary: Retrieves invoices by service account id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch invoices for

404.description: Service Account or Invoices Not Found

get.summary: Retrieve a single invoice by service account id and invoice id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch invoice for

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: id of invoice to fetch

404.description: Service Account or Invoices Not Found

get.summary: Retrieve a single invoice by service account id and invoice id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch invoice for

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: id of invoice to fetch

200.description: 200 returns a list of invoice line items

404.description: Service Account or Invoice Not Found

get.summary: Downloads a single invoice by service account id and invoice id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch invoice for

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: id of invoice to download

404.description: Service Account or Invoice Not Found

get.summary: Retrieves payment extension status by service account id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch payment extension status for

post.summary: Requests for a payment extension towards the service account specified.  Will be set to 7 days past the action date unless extend is set to true in the request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to request a payment extension for

get.summary: Retrieves payments by service account id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to fetch payments for

post.summary: Makes a payment towards the service account specified

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to make a payment for

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to search by

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: number of notes to be retrieved

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of service account to add note to

200.description: 200 returns a service account notes response

get.summary: Retrieves disconnect letter info by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of customer to fetch

Extend.description: Flag that indicates that the payment extension will be extended an extra 3 days past the normal 7

Name.description: Name of the user who the token will be issued for

Expires_In.description: Number of seconds for the token to live for.  Defaults to 1 day or 86,400 seconds.  Max is one day.
